name: Timelapse Flight | Birmingham to Dublin | Aer Lingus Airbus A320
description:
A timelapse flight video with Aer Lingus, from Birmingham to Dublin, onboard Airbus A320 EI-DEO (in Irish Rugby livery) operating flight EI263 on April 1 2016.

Our journey today begins at Birmingham Airport, early in the morning.  

It isn't long before we push back, and taxi out to runway 15 at Birmingham.  We depart to the south, making a sweeping left turn as we climb to the northwest towards Liverpool.

Cruise altitude today is a relatively low 18,000ft on such a short flight, and it's not long before we commence our descent towards Dublin.  Today's arrival calls for a rare landing on runway 16 at Dublin, and as such we are vectored around quite a bit to establish on the southbound approach towards Dublin.

We touch down on schedule, taxying into a stand at Terminal 1.  

Video taken from seat 8F.

Airline:  Aer Lingus
Flight:  EI263
Aircraft:  Airbus A320 EI-DEO
From:  Birmingham (BHX)
To:  Dublin (DUB)
Departure:  08:21
Arrival:  09:09
Flight Time:  00:48
Seat:  8A
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/tlA5xi



✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
